Choose the correct set of statements:
(a) Seed typically consists of seed coat(s) cotyledons(s) and embryo axis 
(b) Cotyledons of embryo are simple strucures. generally thick and swollen due to storage of food reserve 
(c) Albuminous seed have no residual endosperm e.g. pea, groundnut 
(d) Micropyle facilitates entry of O₂ & water into the seed during germination

Match Column- I with Column II 
Column I 
(A) Albuminous seed 
(B) Non- albuminous seed 
(c) Apomixis 
(d) Parthenocarpic fruit 

Column II 
(i) Pea, ground nut 
(ii) Wheat, barley 
(iii) Banana 
(iv) Asteraceae & grasses
